name: Editor Level ID API
description: Assigns Level IDs to Editor levels that other mods can use to refer to them

show-ids.name: Show IDs in search
show-ids.description: Whether the assigned IDs should be shown in the list cells for My Levels and My Lists

debug-print.name: Print debug messages in Geode Console
debug-print.description: Whether debug messages should be printed in the Geode Console for further debugging assistance
